div.head: 不隨
div.div: paralyzed; [body parts] do not follow [one’s will]

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: paralyzed; [body parts] do not follow [one’s will]

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with bu sui 不遂 . Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 1: 其狀半身不隨，肌肉偏枯 , “Its appearance is such that one half of the body does not follow [one’s will]. Muscles and flesh wither on their own”.
